'''Mysterious Lamp of Fate Ordained''' is a [[Furnishing]] item that can be used in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

It can be obtained by finishing any [[Kaeya]]'s [[Hangout Event]] Act I: [[Shenanigans and Sweet Wine]] route that branches from [[Reunion]] with [[Beautifully-Wrapped Gift Box]] in the inventory for the first time.
